name: part_003
file: tmp_【重大告知アリ＆3D LIVE】秘密結社holoX4周年 3DLIVE【#SSholoX4周年】 [Z_E5w_pYAck]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: The members of holoX are on stage for an MC segment, announcing important news and introducing the first solo performance.
Hakui Koyori performs her solo song 'Baku Love Chemistry'.
Transition between solo performances with stage effects.
Laplus Darknesss begins her solo performance of 'Kyouryuu nai yo'.

subtitles.original: holoX！4周年！
subtitles.english: holoX! 4th Anniversary!

subtitles.original: はい、そして本日は何やらライブだけではなく…
subtitles.english: Yes, and today, it seems there's more than just the live...

subtitles.original: お？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: 重要な情報が…
subtitles.english: Some important information...

subtitles.original: 重要？
subtitles.english: Important?

subtitles.original: もりもりもりもり、盛りだくさんらしいので！
subtitles.english: It seems there's heaps and heaps of it!

subtitles.original: 盛りだくさん！盛りだくさん！
subtitles.english: Lots of things! Lots of things!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、最後までちゃんと見ていくように！
subtitles.english: Everyone, make sure to watch until the end!

subtitles.original: 見て！見て！
subtitles.english: Watch! Watch!

subtitles.original: 途中退室禁止です！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Leaving early is forbidden! Please stay tuned!

subtitles.original: もり、もり、盛りだくさん…
subtitles.english: Heaps and heaps of it...

subtitles.original: あ、い、う、え、お！もりもり…
subtitles.english: A, I, U, E, O! Mori mori...

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってください。なになん？なになん？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute. What's going on? What's going on?

subtitles.original: もう早くしないと。
subtitles.english: We have to hurry.

subtitles.original: みんなに見せられないから、ライブ。
subtitles.english: We won't be able to show the live to everyone.

subtitles.original: はい、早速！最初は…（ドラムロール）誰だ誰だ…
subtitles.english: Okay, first up! The first one is... Who is it?

subtitles.original: はい！こよりちゃんのパートから！
subtitles.english: Yes! Starting with Koyori-chan's part!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: なんだそのポーズ？キュート！可愛い！
subtitles.english: What's that pose? Cute! So cute!

subtitles.original: あ、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Ah, so cute!

subtitles.original: こよりちゃん行ってらっしゃい！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Koyori-chan, have a good one! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: 見ててね！見てるよ！
subtitles.english: Watch me! We're watching!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！走って！広いから！
subtitles.english: Good luck! Run! It's a big stage!

subtitles.original: 急かさないでよ！
subtitles.english: Don't rush me!

subtitles.original: あ、邪魔だから行くよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, you're in the way, so let's go.

subtitles.original: え？俺たちも？
subtitles.english: Eh? Us too?

subtitles.original: 早く！早く！行くぜ早く！
subtitles.english: Hurry! Hurry! Let's go, hurry!

subtitles.original:
爆ラブ☆ケミストリー
作詞・作曲・編曲：ナユタン星人
subtitles.english:
Baku Love Chemistry
Lyrics, Music & Arrangement: Nayutalien

subtitles.original: ラヴは必勝 存在実体マジ感 調合は未完成 トキメキのケミカ
subtitles.english:
Love is a sure win, the actual existence is imminent,
the compounding is incomplete, the chemistry of heartbeats

subtitles.original: ふうんなるほど そんじゃこれならどうか 頓心ゲボならラブラトリー
subtitles.english:
Hmm, I see. Then how about this?
If it's the heart-moving type, then it's a love-ratory

subtitles.english:
Yes! Flustered, flustered, caution!
The flowers that wait will become sweet

subtitles.original: はい！シュ集中感情のモーション 奇跡的に美味しくなーれ
subtitles.english:
Yes! Con-concentrated emotional motion,
let it become miraculously delicious!

subtitles.english:
Hearts in the flask, oh no, it's an art,
testing the effects, you are the best

subtitles.original: こら僕は君になれ ちょっと危険なまぜまぜ
subtitles.english:
Hey, I want to become you,
a slightly dangerous mixing

subtitles.original: ドッカン！ケミストリーなの 曖昧な君クロマトグラフィー

chromatography of the ambiguous you

become more addicted

birth of chemistry with you

subtitles.original: め・白い煙吐いて そっちのタイプのドキドキじゃない

it's not that type of throb

subtitles.original: けどまあある意味成功かな？

subtitles.original: ラヴは不要成 日記を持って無し感 調合は試作中 噛んだのは飛べさ

Love is an unnecessary addition, keeping a diary is a no-no,
